title: A Randomized Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Multi-Center Study of CDN-468 (integrin inhibitor) in Patients With Advanced Melanoma
officialTitle: A Randomized Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Multi-Center Study of CDN-468 (integrin inhibitor) in Patients With Advanced Melanoma
description: This is a randomized double-blind, placebo-controlled multi-center study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of CDN-468 (integrin inhibitor) in patients with Advanced Melanoma. The study will enroll approximately 66 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 25-65 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Advanced Melanoma
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
